summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3959 for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, from Lucile Street to Mead Street; by the construction of a street lighting system, under Ordinance No. 48223, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
